channel.title: Adding/Editing Commands :s
channel.description:
If I try to edit a command in my client, it doesn't reallly save. Example: There is a command that have the name "xrichie". If you type ::xrichie while playing you get 2000mil, i wanted to change the amout of the coins so I edited "addItem(995, 2000000000)" to "addItem(995, 20000000)". I saved the file and I compiled everything. But ingame if I type ::xrichie now, i still get the 2000mil..
Help me :(

item.title: Adding/Editing Commands :s
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well for one your post says you changed two billion to two hundred million. So the way you describe it there’s actually not problem, maybe you should fix your post because right now I’m kind of confused.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding/Editing Commands :s
item.dc:creator: @Lennie Lennie
item.description:
@Lennie wrote:

If I try to edit a command in my client, it doesn’t reallly save.
Example:
There is a command that have the name “xrichie”.
If you type ::xrichie while playing you get 2000mil, i wanted to change the amout of the coins so I edited “addItem(995, 2000000000)” to “addItem(995, 20000000)”. I saved the file and I compiled everything. But ingame if I type ::xrichie now, i still get the 2000mil…

Help me

Read full topic
